meanings.definition: A papal decree granting a privilege or permission.
meanings.sent1: The indult from the Pope allowed the monks to celebrate a special mass.
meanings.sent2: The indult was a document that gave the nuns permission to visit the nearby village.
meanings.sent3: The indult to eat dessert before dinner made the children very happy.
meanings.sent4: Receiving the indult felt like being handed a golden ticket to a magical land.
meanings.sent5: The indult to stay up past bedtime was a dream come true for the young boy.

meanings.definition: To grant a privilege or permission.
meanings.sent1: The king decided to indult the knight with the honor of leading the army.
meanings.sent2: She indulted her friend to borrow her favorite book for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The teacher indulted the students to have a popcorn party in class.
meanings.sent4: His kindness indulted her to feel like she belonged in the group.
meanings.sent5: The boss indulted the employees to take a longer lunch break on Fridays.
